Telkomsel dan IndiHome Beri Penjelasan Soal Gangguan Internet
05 Nov 2019, 11:40 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi (CNN Indonesia/ Aditya Panji)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Telkomsel mengakui terjadi gangguan jaringan internet pagi ini, Selasa (5/11). Gangguan terjadi pada akses internet dari Grup Telkom. Sehingga, gangguan ini berpengaruh pada layanan Telkomsel dan IndiHome milik Telkom Indonesia."Telah terjadi penurunan kualitas layanan data internet yang disebabkan oleh gangguan pada akses internet internasional Telkom Group," jelas Denny Abidin, VP Corporate Communications Telkomsel seperti tertulis dalam keterangan resmi yang diterima CNNIndonesia.com, Selasa (5/11). Hal ini diungkap Denny menanggapi ramainya keluhan netizen soal buruknya kualitas layanan Telkomsel hari ini. Denny menuturkan, gangguan jaringan internet tersebut tidak memengaruhi layanan SMS dan telepon. Sebelumnya, sejumlah netizen mengeluh jaringan Telkomsel mereka tak bisa digunakan untuk mengakses internet. Sehingga, mereka tak bisa mengakses media sosial seperti Facebook, Instagram, dan Youtube. Namun, beberapa netizen lain menyebut masih bisa mengakses Twitter.Dalam pernyataan resminya, Telkom menyebut proses perbaikan jaringan telah selesai dilakukan. Arif Prabowo, Vice President Corporate Communications PT Telkom Indonesia menyebut gangguan terjadi selama 45 menit."Kami informasikan bahwa proses perbaikan telah selesai dilakukan. Gangguan yang sempat terjadi selama 45 menit ini dapat disolusikan pada pukul 11:10 WIB. Saat ini semua layanan TelkomGroup sudah beroperasi normal," jelasnya. Berdasarkan pantauan Fing, situs yang mendeteksi performa jaringan sejumlah penyedia internet di Indonesia, performa layanan internet Telkom Indonesia terpantau memburuk sekitar pukul 10:15 WIB dan terselesaikan dalam waktu 30 menit. Puncak gangguan terjadi pada pukul 10:40 WIB.



Gangguan ini dilaporkan terjadi di beberapa kota seperti Jakarta, Surabaya, Denpasar, Bandung, Semarang, Palu, Banjarmasin, Bekasi, Medan, dan Makassar. (eks)

Telkomsel and IndiHome Explain the Problem of Internet Interference
05 Nov 2019, 11:40 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration (CNN Indonesia / Aditya Panji)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Telkomsel admitted that there was an internet network disruption this morning, Tuesday (11/5). Interference occurred in internet access from Telkom Group. "This has caused a decline in the quality of internet data services caused by disruptions to Telkom Group's international internet access," said Denny Abidin, VP of Telkomsel Corporate Communications as written in an official statement received by CNNIndonesia .com, Tuesday (5/11). This was revealed by Denny in response to the widespread complaints of netizens about the poor quality of Telkomsel's services today. Denny said, the internet network disruption did not affect SMS and telephone services. Previously, a number of netizens complained that their Telkomsel network could not be used to access the internet. So, they cannot access social media like Facebook, Instagram, and Youtube. However, several other netizens said they could still access Twitter. In its official statement, Telkom said the network repair process had been completed. Arif Prabowo, Vice President of Corporate Communications of PT Telkom Indonesia, said that the disturbance occurred in 45 minutes. "We are informed that the repair process has been completed. The disruption that occurred for 45 minutes can be resolved at 11:10 WIB. Currently all TelkomGroup services have been operate normally, "he explained. Based on Fing's observation, a site that detects the network performance of a number of internet providers in Indonesia, the performance of Telkom Indonesia's internet service has been observed to deteriorate around 10:15 WIB and finish within 30 minutes. The disturbance peak occurred at 10:40 WIB.



This disorder is reported to occur in several cities such as Jakarta, Surabaya, Denpasar, Bandung, Semarang, Palu, Banjarmasin, Bekasi, Medan, and Makassar. (ex)
